checklistDescription: TODO Items for new directors, managers and/or supervisors.

addToCalendar.displayName: Add to calendar, Slack, and email
addToCalendar.description: Make sure you're added to the 18f-supervisors@gsa.gov listserv, Slack rooms, and Google Calendar.

readGuide.description: Guides are located in the 18F Handbook. Please update your team's handbook page with your information and any changes you'd like to make. File a pull request and changes will be merged.

attendManagementMeeting.description: Information will be on your Google Calendar.

meetTalentTeam.description: Meet with Team Talent to review hiring process for your team

changeCHRIS.description: Change the main appraiser on the CHRIS performance plans for your direct reports to yourself. Note: if you're new to 18F, this will take 4-6 weeks to set up.

readAppraisals.description: Read the performance appraisals for your direct reports on CHRIS.

addTools.description: Different roles will have access to different private slack channels, google groups, trello boards, etc. Prompt your boss and peers for what those are and access.
